Title: Right Between the Gyro-Optics
Description:
My husband Ezgi loves those harvesters, but I don't trust them, and now you can see why!

The lights go out, and they all start trying to kill us!

You want to help me sort this out?

I'm a crack shot with a rifle. You mark the target, and I'll start shooting!
ObjectivesText: With Auebry's help, eliminate 8 Dark-Crazed Harvesters.
RewardText: Ezgi is going to be upset, but you and I did what needed to be done.
